name: Astro Runner (mauro_chagas)
description:
A fun, simple and cute arcade game to pass the time and have fun! In this game, you are an astronaut who got lost in a big space cave. Now, you'll have to escape this cave and dodge all obstacles to the best of your abilities with your rocket!

Lunar Creators Team:

Vitor Baptista

Samuel Vidal

Rafael Vieira

Mauro Chagas

Sincere thanks to Intelli and all teachers for the opportunity to develop this game and live this amazing experience!
